articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Soccer Match with Pyongyangites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Soccer Match with Pyongyangites
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A men's soccer match between the Ryongaksan Team and the Pothonggang Team comprising ace players of the country took place in Kim Il Sung Stadium on Wednesday, the eve of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un appeared in the tribune of honor.
					
					 Among the spectators were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Choe Pu Il and Jo Yon Jun, members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, leading officials of the support organizations for various sports events, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, those in the sports field, sportspersons, working people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the city.
					
					 The match started with the kick-off of the Pothonggang Team.
					
					 The Ryongaksan Team made attempts to score goals through flank attack and short passes which helped a forward make strong kick 16 m from goal mouth, scoring the first goal at around 33rd minute of the first half.
					
					 When the Pothonggang Team had a chance of penalty kick, its forward scored a goal through his skillful kick at around 36th minute of the first half. As a result, the first half ended 1:1.
					
					 A back of the Ryongaksan Team made a smart heading, scoring a goal at around 11th minute of the second half.
					
					 The Ryongaksan Team beat its rival 2:1 in the match.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the nice match and congratulated the players on their success.

articles.title: 7th Round of North-South Working-level Talks Held
articles.content:
7th Round of North-South Working-level Talks Held
 Kaesong, August 14 (KCNA) -- The 7th round of the working-level talks between authorities of the north and the south of Korea for the normalization of operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) took place in the zone on Wednesday.
					 At the talks "Agreement on Normalizing Operation in the KIZ" was adopted.
					
					 The agreement reads in full:
					
					  Agreement on Normalizing Operation in the KIZ
					
					 The north and the south had seven rounds of the working-level talks between their authorities to solve the issue of the KIZ from July 6, 2013 to August 14 and agreed upon the following points for the purpose of developmental normalization of operation in the zone:
					
					1. The north and the south will make sure that the suspension of operation in the KIZ will not reoccur due to limit to passage, workers' withdrawal, etc. but ensure normal operation of the zone such as stable passage of personnel of the south side, the north side's workers' normal attendance and protection of properties of enterprises, unaffected by any situation under any circumstances.
					
					The north and the south will discuss compensation for damage done to the enterprises by the recent suspension of operation and the related issue at the "North-South Joint Committee for the KIZ" to be composed in the future.
					
					2. The north and the south will ensure the personal safety of personnel of the south side visiting the KIZ, protect the assets invested by businessmen and solve the issues of passage, communications and customs.
					
					- They will ensure the safe entry and stay of personnel of the south side in the KIZ.
					
					- They will protect the assets invested by businessmen in the KIZ and build an institutional mechanism for settling dispute such as joint investigation in case of violation of law, compensation for losses, etc.
					
					- They decided to take measures for ensuring normal passage, providing internet and mobile communications, simplifying the procedure of customs clearance and reducing its time as an immediate task for settling the issues of passage, communications and customs clearance and discuss the related working matters at the "North-South Joint Committee for the KIZ".
					
					3. The north and south will provide world-level conditions for business to the enterprises in the KIZ and develop it into an industrial zone with international competitiveness.
					
					- They will actively encourage foreign businesses' induction in the zone.
					
					- They will develop various business systems including labor, taxation, wage and insurance applied in the zone to the world-level.
					
					- They will explore ways to develop the KIZ into the one with international competitiveness such as recognition of preferential tariff in case of export of its products to a third country, etc.
					
					- They will push ahead with a joint briefing on foreign investment.
					
					4. The north and the south will organize and operate the "North-South Joint Committee for the KIZ" to implement the above-said provisions and have necessary sub-committees under it. To this end, they will conclude an "agreement on organizing and operating north-south joint committee for the KIZ" and start the activities of the relevant institutions.
					
					5. The north and the south will set up an institutional mechanism for ensuring safe entry and stay in the zone and for protecting invested assets and make positive efforts to ensure that the enterprises in the zone maintain and re-operate the equipment.
					
					 August 14, 2013.
					
					 The adoption of the "Agreement on Normalizing Operation in the KIZ" at the talks will bring joy to all compatriots aspiring after reconciliation, cooperation, reunification and improved inter-Korean relations on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the liberation of the country.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Honestly Redress Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Honestly Redress Its Past Crimes 
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures against Sexual Slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and for Victims of Forced Drafting issued a statement Wednesday, 68 years since the defeat of Japanese imperialism. 
					 The Japanese imperialists took the lives of millions of guiltless people and imposed physical pain and disgrace upon Koreans, keeping Korea and its people under illegal armed occupation. In addition to this, they caused serious mental and cultural damage and economic losses to the tune of astronomical figures. 
					
					 They forced women of many Asian countries and 200,000 Korean women into sexual slavery, taking them to battle fields of the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					
					 Several decades have passed since the defeat of Japan but it has never made honest repentance to the victims and the countries which fell victim to its aggression and to the international community for the crimes committed by it against humanity, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 Japan has not shown any elementary intention to redress its past crimes concerning the relations with the DPRK and its victims.
					
					 What is intolerable is that Japan is openly embellishing and denying the despicable crimes in the eyes of the victims still alive though it committed too many crimes to apologize and repent of them down through generations. 
					
					 Entering this year, Japanese high-ranking officials let loose a string of balderdashes that there is no evidence proving that Japan took away women as sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army, the sexual slavery for it was needed in those days and that the army and prostitution are bound to go together. These are the reckless remarks which can hardly be made by human beings and politicians.
					
					 What matters is that the political and public circles of Japan and its people are overlooking such poisonous remarks and those responsible for them, not demanding them own any political and moral responsibility, though the whole world is enraged by them. 
					
					 It is commonplace in Japan that it is staging "commemorative events" while raising a claim to the land of other country, resorting to political suppression and persecution of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), an overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, and Koreans in Japan and instilling justice of the past war of aggression into the rising generation.  
					
					 The political trend of Japan veering to the right day by day and its social atmosphere are sparking off deep concern of the international community as they are an unstable factor of threatening peace and stability in East Asia.
					
					 If Japan follows in the footsteps of the Japanese imperialists, disregarding the advice of the international community and the lesson taught by history and justifying its crime-woven past, it will find itself in the bottomless abyss of ruin.
					
					 It is nearly 70 years since the end of the World War II and the defeat of Japan, a war criminal state.
					
					 Japan should make a bold political decision before the passage of 70 years for the sake of its stability and prosperity, make clean of its inglorious past crimes and thus opt for promoting genuine reconciliation and confidence with the international community.

articles.title: Credentials from German Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials from German Ambassador
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from German Ambassador to the DPRK Thomas Schaefer at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					 After receiving credentials Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Message from President of Cote d'Ivoire
articles.content:
Message from President of Cote d'Ivoire
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a congratulatory message from Alassane Ouattara, president of Cote d'Ivoire, on August 12.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am pleased to wish Your Excellency and the friendly Korean people peace, reconciliation and prosperity on behalf of the people and the government of Cote d'Ivoire and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the end of the Korean War and the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 I am convinced that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between our two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests of the two peoples thanks to our concerted efforts.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and Jong Il Sim, a Korean residing in Russia, on a visit to the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute.
					
					 Meanwhile, the chief and staff members of the mission laid a bouquet before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on the same day.

articles.title: Reception Hosted by Russian Charge d'Affaires A.I.
articles.content:
Reception Hosted by Russian Charge d'Affaires A.I.
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Igor Sagitov, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Russian embassy here, gave a reception at his embassy on Wednesday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there on invitation were Jon Kil Su, minister of Railways, Kang Phyo Yong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand.
					
					 The Russian consulate general in Chongjin hosted a reception on the same day.

articles.title: Mosaics Erected in South Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Mosaics Erected in South Hamgyong Province
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Mosaics "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" depicting smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great men, were erected in different parts of South Hamgyong Province. They included Tanchon City and Hamju, Kumya, Kowon, Pukchong, Jongphyong and Hongwon counties and the Rahung Railway Factory. 
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to many units in Tanchon City, wisely leading them to achieve great successes in the developing economy and improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 They visited Hamju County several times to give detailed instructions for solving the issues arising in the county including the matters of boosting the grain production and developing local industry. 
					
					 Kumya and Kowon counties are associated with the immortal exploits of the peerlessly great men who clearly indicated the orientations and ways for them to follow, provided their people with more bountiful living conditions and led them with loving care to successfully preserve and manage cultural relics. 
					
					 They also provided field guidance to Pukchong, Jongphyong and Hongwon counties, energetically steering the counties to bring about a new turn in developing fruit and poultry farming, increase agricultural production and turn into lands of bliss.
					
					 The Rahung Railway Factory is associated with their leadership feats performed for developing the nation's railway transport. 
					
					 Officials and workers of the February 8 Vinalon Complex erected a mosaic depicting Kim Jong Il, who worked heart and soul to develop the Juche vinalon industry.

articles.title: Lots of People Visit Revolutionary Battle Sites, Historical Sites
articles.content:
Lots of People Visit Revolutionary Battle Sites, Historical Sites
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Revolutionary battle sites and historical sites are visited by many people including servicepersons and students.
					 Those sites are associated with the exploits for national liberation by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Tens of thousands of people from more than 50 units have visited the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu over the past 10 days.
					
					 The visitors have deeply grasped the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung, who defeated the gangster-like Japanese imperialists through the arduous anti-Japanese struggle and achieved the historic cause of national liberation.
					
					 Making tours to the secret camps on Mt. Paektu, Saja Peak, Mt. Kom and Mt. Kanbaek and other areas, the visitors looked back on the exploits of the President, who led the Korean revolution to victory with main emphasis on the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 At the Pochonbo, Samjiyon and Taehongdan revolutionary battle sites, they admired the rare wisdom and outstanding commanding arts of the legendary hero of the anti-Japanese struggle who dealt telling blows at the Japanese imperialists and aroused all the Koreans to the struggle for national liberation.
					
					 Also visited by lots of people every day are the revolutionary battle sites and historical sites in Sinhung, Yonsa, Onsong, Puryong, Tanchon, Riwon and Rangrim areas associated with the exploits of the President and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Tour Arch of Triumph
articles.content:
Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Tour Arch of Triumph
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) toured the Arch of Triumph on Wednesday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They looked round the arch, being briefed on how it was erected to convey President Kim Il Sung's exploits performed for liberating Korea down through generations.
					
					 At the end of the visit the chief said:
					
					 The President crushed the brigandish Japanese imperialists to liberate the country.
					
					 His revolutionary career devoted to the country and nation will shine forever along with the Korean history.

articles.title: Doctorate of Linguistics Awarded to Korean in China
articles.content:
Doctorate of Linguistics Awarded to Korean in China
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A doctorate of linguistics was awarded to Nam Myong Chol (Nan Mingzhe), dean of the Korean Language Faculty of the College of Foreign Language Studies of Qingdao University of Science and Technology of China, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					 He scientifically and theoretically systematized the practical issues arising in the use of Pyongyang's cultural language for Korean language broadcasting in China and thus made a contribution to widely introducing and preserving the Juche character of Korean language and its advantages.

articles.title: Youngsters Create Lots of Literary Pieces
articles.content:
Youngsters Create Lots of Literary Pieces
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Creation of literary pieces is popular among school youth and children across the country to win the April 15 Mangyongdae Creation Prize for Loyalty.
					 Thousands of pieces have been contributed during the literary pieces prize contest this year.
					
					 They included children's poem "Breeze on Mangyong Hill", children's song "Jeep of the General" and collection of children's poems "Larch of Mt. Paektu" telling about deep reverence for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and firm will to be faithful to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Children's poem "Biggest Fortune", collections of children's poems "I am delegate to Children's Union conference" and "Happy children" and other pieces truthfully portray the pride and self-esteem of the new generation holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as father of the big socialist family.
					
					 Some pieces reflect school youth and children growing up to be pillars of powerful and prosperous Korea, being equipped with knowledge, a good moral character and good health.
					
					 A ceremony of awarding the prize took place at the Central Youth Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ending National Division
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ending National Division
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The urgent task for the Koreans who are undergoing the bitter experience of the national division is to end the acute confrontation on the Korean Peninsula, ensure lasting peace and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country at an early date, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Whoever is a Korean should not remain an onlooker to the trial faced by the cause of reunification. The grim situation urges all the compatriots in the north, south and overseas to determinedly turn out in the nation-wide sacred struggle to realize their long-cherished desire of national reunification.
					
					 National reconciliation and unity are a precondition which guarantees peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 If the Korean nation achieves reconciliation and unity, the road for independent reunification, peace and prosperity will be paved. But the confrontation between the north and the south will only bring distress and trouble and will entail a war in the end. Only the aggressive outside forces are desirous of the inter-Korean confrontation.
					
					 We can never leave the June 15 era of reunification when a great surge of reconciliation and unity prevailed just as a past memory. 
					
					 The Koreans should always cover the road of national independence, the road of "By our nation itself". When all the Koreans turn out to activate reconciliation and unity, cooperation and exchange, it will bring peace and reunification earlier.

articles.title: South Korean Opposition Party Launches Emergency Action
articles.content:
South Korean Opposition Party Launches Emergency Action
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Unified Progressive Party, an opposition party in south Korea, held a press conference at Chonggye Plaza in Seoul on Sunday at which it declared the start of an 100 hour-long emergency action for people's successful  candlelight struggle. 
					 The speakers noted that an emergency action was kicked off for success of another 100,000-people candlelight struggle on Wednesday in the wake of the candlelight rally held across south Korea on August 10 in protest against the Intelligence Service's interference in the election with at least 100,000 people attending.
					
					 Gone are the days when people were waiting for a reply after sending a warning to the ruling forces, they declared, threatening to launch a people's action against the present chief executive and "Saenuri Party" defying their will.
					
					 If the "Saenuri Party" refuses to cooperate in the state investigation and those suspected in the case fail to appear to the last, the "president" should come out herself to clarify the case before the people.
					
					 They declared they would certainly bring to light the suspicions about the IS's case, reflecting the desire of all people.

articles.title: Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "Headquarters of the Movement for Nullifying 18th-term Presidential Election and Making President Park Geun Hye Resign" made up of students held a press conference outside Chongwadae some days ago in demand of the resignation of the puppet chief executive.
					 At the press conference speakers denounced the chief executive for hiding at Chongwadae while evading the responsibility for the case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the election and the police for cracking down on the actions of people of all social standings to settle the case.
					
					 They demanded the chief executive admit that she deceived the people through election rigging and step down at once.
					
					 They declared they would continue the actions to put an end to the power's unreasonable acts.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Korean in China
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Korean in China
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, said that he was recollecting with deep emotion the undying feats the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed to be recorded in the national history with the approach of the significant day of Korea's liberation.  
					 He went on:
					
					 In the past the Korean people were subject to all sorts of maltreatment and humiliation as a stateless nation under the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 They could put an end to the distress-torn history as they were led by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Embarking on the road of revolution in his early years, he led the rigorous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory and built a country where the working people became masters.
					
					 The independent and creative life they are now leading is linked with the day of Korea's liberation brought by him.
					
					 As there is the homeland for them, the overseas Koreans could lead a worthy life with great pride and self-confidence even in the lands of other countries.
					
					 The great feats performed by him for the liberation of the country will shine long with the national history.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, identical to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, is steering the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He has wisely led all the service personnel and people with his distinguished political caliber and noble virtues, putting the dignity of the nation and its power at the highest level.
					
					 A dynamic general advance is being made in different parts of the country to build an economic power and improve the standard of people's living under his energetic leadership.
					
					 Grand monumental edifices and modern production bases have been built and a socialist land of bliss is appearing. The noble ideal of the people and high civilization are becoming realities. This is encouraging the overseas Koreans.
					
					 We will more dynamically advance along the road of patriotism, true to the behests of the Generalissimos and the noble intention of the Marshal, and actively contribute to building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Praise Koreans
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Praise Koreans
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Libyan paper February on August 1 carried a special write-up under the headline "On the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the DPRK's victory in the war" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un standing on the platform of Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 The paper in an article said:
					
					 An event beyond imagination occurred in the East six decades ago.
					
					 The U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world kneeled down before the young DPRK.
					
					 The losses suffered by the U.S. in the three-year long Korean war were beyond imagination.
					
					 The U.S. signed the Armistice Agreement, a surrender document, in the world's eyes on July 27, 1953.
					
					 The Nepalese newspaper Gorkha Express on July 30 carried a special write-up with a photo of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "How was the Korean war occurred" elaborated on the circumstances of the Korean war which was called the fiercest war since the World War II downward.
					
					 The British newspaper The New Worker on July 19 carried an article titled "War is incompatible with peace".
					
					 The paper said although the sound of firing stopped on the Korean Peninsula the new war provocation moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers continue with an aim at invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 A Hungarian newspaper on July 20 carried an article which said:
					
					 Through the Korean war the progressive mankind realized that there is only one leader in the world as great as President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Today Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean people at the supreme posts of the party and the state.
					
					 The world sees the DPRK achieving new great successes in the way of socialism under his leadership.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They included a seminar and film show in Brazil, a photo exhibition in South Africa and film shows in Thailand and the Czech Republic in the period between July 25 and August 1.
					
					 The chairperson of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il cited the brilliant successes achieved by the DPRK to highly praise the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by winning the war and the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The curator and deputy curator of the Pretoria City Library in South Africa lauded Kim Il Sung for resolutely foiling the enemy forces' numerical and technical superiority with his outstanding stratagem, matchless pluck and tested commanding art and shattering their myth of "mightiness" during the war.
					
					 The director of the Mariners' Ship and Commerce Company in Thailand said the DPRK's victory in the war was a victory of the wise military idea, original strategy, tactics and war methods of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and a victory of the indomitable fighting spirit of the service personnel and people of the DPRK united close around their leader.
					
					 The director of another company in Thailand said Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il put forth the Songun idea, successfully applied it in practice and thus turned the DPRK into a full-fledged politico-ideological power and military power.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- International community expresses ever-growing reverence for President Kim Il Sung who liberated Korea through the long and hard-fought anti-Japanese struggle and brought the dignified and happy life to the Korean people.
					 The chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art said that on August 15 every year the Korean and other progressive peoples of the world recollect the great exploits Kim Il Sung performed in liberating Korea. 
					
					 AKP News Agency of Cambodia said as follows:
					
					 The anti-Japanese armed struggle organized by Kim Il Sung was the legendary guerrilla warfare unprecedented in history. 
					
					 HeThe President staged 15-year-long hard guerrilla warfare against the Japanese imperialists with neither state backing nor assistance by a regular army. 
					
					 15-year-long struggle is unprecedented in the world history of partisan struggle. 
					
					 The guerrilla struggle led by him produced a lot of legends and it was widely known at that time. 
					
					 The great personality of Kim Il Sung as a legendary partisan will be conveyed long in history. 
					
					 The Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud said it is of special significance that the guerrilla warfare became the main formula of the national liberation struggle in colonies thanks to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said that Kim Il Sung defeated the Japanese imperialists and victoriously concluded the national liberation struggle of the Korean people on August 15, 1945. His exploits will shine long in the world history of the national liberation struggle in colonies, he added. 
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its internet website an article saying that progressive mankind reveres Kim Il Sung as a gifted strategist, peerlessly brilliant commander and benevolent father of all people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de viviendas para cientificos de universidad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de viviendas para cientificos de universidad
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el lugar de construccion de viviendas para los cientificos de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					Le acompanaron Choe Thae Bok, Ri Jae Il, Pak Thae Song y Ma Won Chun.
					
					Los apartamentos modernos de 44 y 36 pisos, que se levantan en la capitalina encrucijada de Ryonghung, son un regalo del Mariscal para los profesores e investigadores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					
					Durante el recorrido, Kim Jong Un averiguo en detalles como marcha la construccion.
					
					Instruyo los problemas que se debe tener en cuenta en la construccion de rascacielos, diciendo que sera vistoso y dara la impresion estable si acondicionan facilidades de servicios publicos en la parte abajo a proporcion de la altura del edificio.
					
					Estuvo en el apartamiento no.1 del tercer piso del edificio no.2.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que es agradable y original la entrada del pasillo a la antesala hecha en forma arqueada y adornada con columnas.
					
					Paso revista a los cuartos, la cocina y el comedor evaluando la ejecucion limpia.
					
					Tras cerciorarse de como se fabrican los muebles para todas las familias, instruyo que prepararan tambien el televisor para los cientificos que se mudaran a sus nuevas casas.
					
					Resaltando la necesidad de prestar atencion primaria al aseguramiento de la calidad en la construccion, enseno que se debe ofrecer a los cientificos las viviendas perfectas para que ellos no las reparen despues de la mudanza.
					
					Los profesores que dedican toda su vida para educar las generaciones venideras y formar el personal competente del pais son patriotas y no hay nada de escatimar para ellos, dijo y agrego que el partido tiene la intencion de construir mucho mas viviendas como estas para ofrecerlas a los profesores y los investigadores.
					
					Cuidar con esmero las condiciones de vida de los profesores e investigadores es una importante labor vinculada con el futuro de la patria, asevero y continuo que cuando se les ofrezcan magnificas viviendas y se les faciliten las comodidades de la vida, ellos podran dedicarse sin preocupacion alguna a la educacion de generaciones venideras y a la investigacion cientifica.
					
					Hay que anteponer y tratar con preferencia a los cientificos y tecnicos inclusive profesores e investigadores para materializar la idea del partido de dar importancia a la ciencia, apunto.
					
					Este ano, se construyen las viviendas de los cientificos de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y en el proximo, construiremos las otras para la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, senalo.
					
					Prometio construir viviendas de cientificos y casas de reposo tambien en la zona de Phyongsong, donde esta situada la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, y en el pintoresco lago Yonphung.
					
					Dijo que hace falta estudiar bien la situacion de todas las universidades y acondicionar bien los albergues.
					
					Instruyo terminar incondicionalmente la edificacion de las viviendas para los cientificos de la Universidad Kim Il Sung hasta el 10 de octubre, dia de fundacion del PTC, y ofrecerlas a los cientificos.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que la unidad 267 del EPC, que esta manifestando el honor de la unidad heroina en la construccion, apoyara con accion el proposito del partido.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion con motivo del 68o aniversario de derrota de Japon en segunda guerra mundial
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion con motivo del 68o aniversario de derrota de Japon en segunda guerra mundial
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano por Medidas sobre el Problema de ex Esclavas Sexuales para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion con motivo del 68o aniversario de la derrota del imperialismo japones en la segunda guerra mundial. 
					Segun el texto, el imperialismo japones ocupo ilegalmente con armas a Corea y su pueblo durante mas de 40 anos, periodo en el cual mato a millones de civiles inocentes, impuso al pueblo coreano incontables sufrimientos fisicos y verguenzas, graves perdidas culturales y espirituales y astronomicos danos economicos.
					
					En particular, las tropas japonesas llevaron a los campos de batalla a muchas mujeres de los paises asiaticos y a 200 mil coreanas y les obligaron la vida de esclava sexual. 
					
					A varios decenios de su derrota, Japon no ha pedido nunca el perdon a las personas y paises victimas ni a la sociedad internacional y la humanidad por sus crimenes de lesa humanidad. 
					
					En particular, no expone ni la minima voluntad de indemnizar a la RPDC y las victimas de esta. 
					
					Lo intolerable del caso es que ese pais culpable embellece y niega publicamente sus tremendos crimenes en la cara de las victimas sobrevivientes. 
					
					Solo este ano, los funcionarios de alto rango del pais isleno dijeron disparates inhumanos e indecentes para cualquier politico, tales como no hay pruebas de haberse llevado por la fuerza a las victimas de esclavitud sexual, se necesitaban en aquel entonces las esclavas sexuales y son inseparables el ejercito y la prostitucion. 
					
					Lo mas problematico es que el circulo politico, el social y la poblacion de Japon no imputan ninguna responsabilidad politica y moral a tales disparates de que todo el mundo esta indignado. 
					
					Ahora en Japon se desarrolla algun "acto conmemorativo" insistiendo en su soberania sobre territorio ajeno, se justifica la represion politica contra los coreanos residentes en Japon y la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), legitima organizacion ultramarina de compatriotas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y se elogian a la vista de nuevas generaciones la historia de guerras de agresion. 
					
					La tendencia politica y el ambiente social de Japon, que se dirigen a la derechizacion, causan gran preocupacion de la sociedad internacional como factor inestable que amenaza la paz y la estabilidad de Asia oriental. 
					
					Si Japon repite su pasado criminal desoyendo el consejo de la sociedad internacional, olvidando la leccion de la historia y justificando sus crimenes del pasado, caera en el abismo de arruinamiento. 
					
					Se acercan ya 70 anos desde el fin de la segunda guerra mundial y la derrota de Japon. 
					
					Para la estabilidad y la prosperidad de si mismo, Japon debe tomar la decision politica de liquidar completamente su bochornoso expediente del pasado antes del 70o aniversario de su derrota y promover asi la reconciliacion y la confianza con la sociedad internacional.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador aleman
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador aleman
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Thomas Schaefer presento el dia 14 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Federal de Alemania en Corea.
					Luego de recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico aleman.

articles.title: Levantados murales de mosaicos con imagenes de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Levantados murales de mosaicos con imagenes de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Fueron erigidos los murales de mosaicos con imagenes de los grandes hombres sin pares "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung vive siempre en nosotros" y "El gran Dirigente, camarada Kim Jong Il vive siempre en nosotros" en la ciudad de Tanchon, los distritos de Hamju, Kumya, Kowon, Pukchong, Jongphyong y Hongwon y la Fabrica Ferroviaria de Rahung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					El Presidente y el Dirigente visitaron varias unidades de la ciudad de Tanchon para dirigir las labores para el desarrollo economico y la mejora de las condiciones de vida del pueblo.
					
					En el distrito de Hamju dieron detalladas instrucciones sobre las labores distritales, entre otras, incrementar la produccion de cereales y desarrollar la industria local.
					
					En los distritos de Kumya y Kowon iluminaron el rumbo y remedios a seguir y dirigieron a ofrecer a los habitantes las condiciones de vida mas rica y conservar y proteger las reliquias culturales.
					
					En los distritos de Pukchong, Jongphyong y Hongwon, orientaron a registrar un nuevo viraje en la fruticultura y la ganaderia, incrementar la produccion agricola y convertir asi los distritos en el paraiso de la poblacion.
					
					En la Fabrica Ferroviaria de Rahung, tambien estan impregnadas las proezas de los Generalisimos.
					
					Los funcionarios y obreros del Complejo de Vinalon "8 de Febrero" construyeron en su recinto el mural de mosaicos con la imagen del Dirigente quien dedico todos sus esfuerzos para el desarrollo de la industria de vinalon Juche.
